en.label.name: Name
en.message.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this item ?
en.message.leave_empty_to_keep_current_pass: Leave empty to keep current password.
en.login.title: Login to your account
en.password_resetting.request.title: Reset your password
en.password_resetting.request.text: Enter the email address associated to your account. We will send your password recovery procedure to your mailbox.
en.password_resetting.error.title: This link has expired.
en.password_resetting.error.cause1: It has been more than 24 hours since you requested a password reset. You can do a new password request.
en.password_resetting.error.cause2: If you have made more than one request, only the last email will be valid.
en.password_resetting.success.title: Check your emails
en.password_resetting.success.text: An email was sent to %email%. Check your mailbox and follow instructions given.
en.password_resetting.back_login_link: Forget it, send me back to the sign in screen.
en.password_resetting.email.subject: Update your password
en.password_resetting.email.body:
Hello,

A request to reset password of %name% has been made on back-office %app_name%.

Click here to define a new password.

Ignore this e-mail if you are not the initiator.

Sincerely
en.datatable.error.load: An error occurred while loading data.
en.toast.error403: You are not authorized to perform this action.
